en.contents:
The Coding Camp: Break The Web3 Ice With Solana has wrapped up with a huge success. After 6 weeks of workshops and 700 developer applications, we finally got our 100 graduating developers, 24 projects on Demo Day, 3 winners and 10 scholarship recipients.

Check out the winner list below!

Grand Prizes

Three camp heroes are selected by our panel of Judges to receive the following rewards:

  • The Golden Hero: Maius Pay got $15,000 USD from Solana Foundation & 10,000 credits from AWS
  • The Silver Hero: The Astroverse got $10,000 USD from Solana Foundation & 10,000 credits from AWS
  • The Bronze Hero: SolPlay got $5,000 USD from Solana Foundation & 10,000 credits from AWS

Check out the project details here: https://bit.ly/Sol-Web3-VN-Submissions

Individual Scholarships

10 outstanding learners with extraordinary results, hand-picked by the Solana Foundation and Partners who got:

  • An honorary scholarship worth $1,000 USD per month for three consecutive months from Solana Foundation
  • Top 5: A trip to Lisbon, Portugal for the Breakpoint 2022.

They are:

  • Nguyễn Hà Quang, Lamas Finance
  • Hoàng Nghĩa Đức, Lazy Vaccine Platform 
  • Đặng Tuấn Minh, Boost 
  • Phạm Hồng Thái, Scity Metaverse
  • Nguyễn Hải Hoàng, Mesme

Top 5:

  • Nguyễn Sơn Hà, Ahnos
  • Dương Minh Công, Lucid
  • Bùi Lê Chí Bảo, PredictDocs
  • Trần Khắc Vỹ, ARI
  • Vũ Cao Phong, Sol Pool

Check out the project details here: https://bit.ly/Sol-Web3-VN-Submissions

Quiz winners

Those who completed all materials and 10/10 quizzes during the program will receive $100 as part of the Learn-to-Earn prize for their hard work! They are:

  • buidinht***gmail.com

All winners above, please check your email and follow the instructions given to receive your prize. 

The deadline to fill in the prize claiming form is 23:59, Friday, June 17, 2022.

Thank you once again for joining us at the Solana Web3 Coding Camp! We hope you found the program helpful and insightful!
en.title: Solana Web3 Coding Camp 2022 - The Final Winners
